item.description: This 90 minute program looks at stress management in a very systematic way. We separate the types of stress for clarification. Mental, Physical, and Emotional. We then identify the types of pain or sensations that come from the types of stress. We look at the pain scale of 1-10 and identify a starting point. After introducing and practicing 5 techniques the student reevaluates the pain scale again. This practice clearly shows the power of possibilities in controlling any future issues with stress. This is an empowering exercise of stress management taught by Barb Tremlett. Cost $15 per person - FIRST 12 PEOPLE TO REGISTER RECEIVE THE CLASS FOR FREE!!!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: National Public Health Week ~ 5 Minute Stress Managers
